Articles.Content:
Well, I was introduced to this amazing show called Space Night Earth Views a few months ago by someone on the forums when we were discussion music people listen to when playing ksp.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k5EVYoTO8oM

Anyways I was wondering if anyone would be interested in having a go at making an episode that is kerbalised. Even just getting some hudless launch videos and orbiting videos to the ripped soundtrack from one episode would be good?

If I can get some time next weekend inbetween gliding I\'ll try and knock one together.

What do you all think?
